title: Viscosity Converter: Dynamic (Pa·s, cP) & Kinematic (St, cSt)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Dynamic viscosity: 1 Pa·s = 1000 mPa·s = 1000 cP. Poise: 1 P = 0.1 Pa·s → 1 cP = 0.001 Pa·s. Kinematic: ν = μ / ρ If μ in Pa·s and ρ in kg/m³ → ν in m²/s. Stokes: 1 St = 10⁻⁴ m²/s → 1 cSt = 10⁻⁶ m²/s.
